The universe was not so much created as it was imagined. Epified gives you a brief account of the Brahmand -- the universe as dreamed by Brahma.

titles.en: Parshuram - Wielder of the Axe | Epified

descriptions.en: Akshaya Tritiya is celebrated as the birth anniversary of Parshuram. He was the son of Sage Jamadagni and a teacher to Bhishma, Drona, as well as Karna. He was also the sixth avatar of Vishnu.

titles.en: Mahabharata Episode 1 - Shantanu the Unfortunate | Epified

descriptions.en: This week on The Mahabharata we bring you the story of Shantanu the unfortunate.
Everything we do has consequence, affecting many others. Everyone is bound by the rules of Karma.
Reading Mahabharat and Ramayana together gives you the best knowledge of Good, Evil, Victory.
The goddess whose name must be taken every time something is offered to the gods through Agni.

titles.en: Karmic Revolution - A New Mahabharata | An Introduction | Epified

descriptions.en: Karmic Revolution is a new way of seeing the Mahabharata. This is just an introduction. Subscribe to Epified to know more about it
We bring you a series called 'Gods, Heroes, and Masters’, our first video gives you a small introduction of the God "Kubera" known as the "God of Wealth".

titles.en: A Brief History of Temples in India | Epified

descriptions.en: A brief history of temples in India, when was the first temple built? What was religion like before we had temples?. We try to answer some of these questions. So watch the video and build on your knowledge.
